inscription.transcript: Transcription: Publius Oppius filius Camilia [.3 char. .] CIO Ravenna miles legionis V 5 Macedonicae, optio, vixit annos XXX, militavit annos VIIII. Hic situs est. Heres fecit.
inscription.translation: Translation:.cio,,lived (and) . P(ublius) Oppi[us son of...], of (the tribe of) Camilia,of Ravenna soldier of the Legio V 5 Macedonica, (of the rank of) optio, 30 years, served in the army nine years is buried here (His) heir made (this tombstone).

body.inscription: In the Byron vault below lie the remains of Augusta Ada, only daughter of George Gordon Noel, 6th Lord Byron, and wife of William, Earl of Lovelace Born 10th Dec 1815 Died 27th Nov 1852 R.I.P

Sacred to the Memory of Capt. Joseph Alger who departed this life
June 21st 1794Aged 25 years, 11 months, & 6 days
